name: V.S.A.I. Sword Fighting
description:
Your goal: Get gud and beat Expert!... Or can you?

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - move and jump

Spacebar (Tap) - Quick Stab

Spacebar (Hold for .5 sec) - Overhead Slash

Spacebar (Hold for 2 secs.) - Spin Slash - *Immune to damage but can still be blocked*

Down/S + Spacebar - Shield - *Can be used to get out of Hit Stun early*

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Train

Practice your moves! Fall off the edge to go back to the main screen.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Options

Switch your difficulty. Do you dare to challenge Expert mode?
